short_summary: Warranty and Maintenance for Pan and Tilt Devices
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 06 April 2023 by 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of four Pan and Tilt Devices. The Pan and Tilt will be employed as intended either domestically or internationally by ground, air or sea. It will work in conjunction with another piece of equipment weighing approximately 50 lbs.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### W4948-23SE53 Pan and Tilt Devices

#### Contract Details

| **Category** | **Information** |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS3847334887-Doc3861907080 |
| Amendment Number | 6 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3847334887 |
| Publication Date | 2023-02-08 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-04-06T14:00:00 EST |
| Amendment Date | 2023-04-03 |
| Expected Contract Start Date | 2023-02-28 |
| Expected Contract End Date | 2028-03-31 |

#### Tender Status and Description

* **Tender Status:** Cancelled
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Tender Description:** The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the supply and delivery of four Pan and Tilt Devices. These devices will be employed domestically or internationally by ground, air, or sea and will work in conjunction with another piece of equipment weighing approximately 50 lbs.

#### Related Information

* **UNSPSC:** *39121700* Electrical hardware and supplies
* *45121616* Pan heads
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* **Trade Agreements:** *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* *Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* *Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* *Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* *Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* *Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person:** Kathleen Nimuan, tel: Not available
* **Contact Email:** kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15347308?extsite=MTUzNDczMDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
